Class itml.cards.Card

java.lang.Object
  itml.cards.Card
Direct Known Subclasses:
itml.cards.CardAttackCardinal, itml.cards.CardAttackDiagonal, itml.cards.CardAttackLong, itml.cards.CardDefend, itml.cards.CardLeapLeft, itml.cards.CardLeapRight, itml.cards.CardMoveDown, itml.cards.CardMoveLeft, itml.cards.CardMoveRight, itml.cards.CardMoveUp, itml.cards.CardRest
public class itml.cards.Card
extends java.lang.Object

This class provides the type itml.cards.Card, which represents a playing card for determining an action a player can make.

Constructor Detail

itml.cards.Card

protected itml.cards.Card(java.lang.String name,
               itml.cards.Card.CardActionType type,
               int col,
               int row,
               int staminaPoints,
               int hitPoints,
               int defencePoints,
               itml.simulator.Coordinate[] range)
Constructor, create a card.

Parameters:
name - Name of card.
type - Type of card.
col - Relative column movement
row - Relative row movement
staminaPoints - Change in staminaPoints
hitPoints - Change to health.
defencePoints - Defence against opponent's hitpoints.
range - Relative coordinate the card's attack affects.

inAttackRange

public boolean inAttackRange(int colA,
                             int rowA,
                             int colOA,
                             int rowOA)
Check whether a particular square is within the attack range of the card.

Parameters:
colA - column of agent
rowA - row of agent
colOA - column of opponent agent
rowOA - row of opponent agent
Returns:
true if location of opponent agent in attack range of agent location, otherwise false.
